name: Mighty Quest Rogue Palace
description:
Available exclusively for Netflix members.

Hunt for epic loot. Battle big bosses. Hack and slash through a mad maze, and prepare to die — a lot. Come back stronger, save the kingdom. No pressure!

The great Kingdom of Opulencia could really use a hero right now — or several. The King’s greed has led to The Void taking over the kingdom, and you're the only one who can save it. Face crazy foes (goblins and banshees, oh my!) and prepare for action in this approachable, attention-grabbing roguelite.

Features:

• Action, action, action! Mix and match heroes, power-ups, weapons and gear to create unique combos — ideal for replayability.
• Uncover the massive mind palace of the Mad King: Fight your way through ever-changing, ever-menacing dungeons. Unlock all 15 regions and clear the maze!
• Unlock a wide range of heroes: Unlock 20 distinct playable heroes, from the sneaky ranger Sir Daryn to the infamous plague doctor Coma!
• Uncover twisty quests and stories: Play as heroes and experience their own over-the-top, fantastical stories.
• Save the King from... himself: Enlist help from servants of the King to get stronger. With time, they might help you understand what's actually going on!

- Created by Ubisoft Entertainment.
